rules_text:
Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Suspend 3–{1}{W} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
